lead_paragraph: Patrick Reed clinched a spot on the American Ryder Cup team when he won The Barclays on Sunday and immediately set his sights on gaining "sweet revenge" when the U.S. take on Europe in five weeks' time.

headline.print_headline: Reed Seeks 'Sweet Revenge' Against Europe in Ryder Cup
headline.main: Reed Seeks 'Sweet Revenge' Against Europe in Ryder Cup

snippet: Patrick Reed clinched a spot on the American Ryder Cup team when he won The Barclays on Sunday and immediately set his sights on gaining "sweet revenge" when the U.S. take on Europe in five weeks' time....
